name: firelomo
description: Quickly send page content to Flomo

scripts.browserify: cd dist/content && ls -1 *.js | xargs -t -I{} browserify {} -p esmify -o browser.{}
scripts.content-script-patch: cd dist/content && ls -1 browser.*.js | xargs -t sh -c 'echo "null;" >> $@' _
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-ts && npm run browserify && npm run content-script-patch && npm run copy-files
